title: Disadvantage of Binet concept of mental age

content.question: A disadvantage of using the concept of mental age in assessing intelligence because of which of the following?

choices.label: It is based on a negatively skewed distribution.
Its norms are no longer appropriate.
It produces unreliable test results among rural children.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
